sn35.4:1.4: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn35.4:1.12: Yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn35.4:1.13: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupesupi nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati, gandhesupi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati, photthabbesupi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati.
sn35.4:1.14: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.4:1.15: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
